name: Godfather
description: Part of the mafia, but inspects as innocent.

name: Hooker
description: Chooses one person to roleblock each night.

name: Detective
description: Chooses one person each night to learn their alignment.

name: Doctor
description: Chooses one person each night to protect from kills. Cannot choose the same person two nights in a row.

name: Vigilante
description: Once per game, can kill a person at night.

name: Sniper
description: Once per game, can kill a person during the day.

name: Bleeder
description: When killed at night, survives one extra day and dies the next night.

name: Parity Detective
description: Chooses two people each night to learn whether or not they have the same alignment.
